page.title: 08Employment in Glenisla.
page.content: Glenisla is open countryside and the biggest job provider is farming. Our area contains six farms providing the livelihood for six families. Few of these farmers employ full-time workers but do make use of seasonal workers at busy times, such as during the sping at lambing time. Forestry is not done on a large scale and provides very few job opportunities. Only one person in the Glen is employed full-time with the Forestry Commission. Most of the work done in this field is done by people living outwith Glenisla. The two hotels in the Glen provide the opportunity for full-time and part-time employment. Jobs included in this are waiting tables, bar staff, cooking staff, cleaning staff and gardeners.Most of these employees are local though not always.
